ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS in order to strengthen Canadaâ€™s ties to Romania, Bulgaria and the European Union (EU) as a whole. The lifting of the Temporary Resident Visa requirements will lead to immediate economic benefits through which the increase in the number of business travelers and visitors, will build momentum to expand trade, investment and tourism, strengthen people-to-people ties, and provide lasting benefits for Romania, Bulgaria and Canada.
